channel.title: Retired on Department of Atmospheric Sciences, Yonsei University

item.title: Tae-Young Lee
item.description:
Research interests

  • Mesoscale Meteorology
  • Air Pollution Meteorology
  • Atmospheric Modeling
  • Numerical Weather Prediction

Education

  • Ph.D. (1984) Oregon State University, Korea

Tenure

1987.3~2017.2

item.title: Jeong Woo Kim

Research interests

  • Atmospheric Dynamics

item.title: Song-You Hong
item.description:
Research interests

  • Numerical Modeling
  • Short-term Forecasting
  • Seasonal Forecasting
  • Heavy rain
  • Regional Climate

Education

  • Ph.D. (1992) Atmospheric Sciences, Seoul National University, Seoul, Korea

Scientific Work Experience

  • Director, Korea Institute of Atmospheric Prediction Systems(KIAPS) (‘14~)
  • Member, The Korean Academy of Science and Technology(KAST) (‘14~)
  • NCAR Affiliate Scientist, National Center for Atmospheric Research(NCAR), USA (‘13~)
  • Editor, Meteorology and Atmospheric Physics(SCI Journal) (‘11~)
  • Editor-in-Chief, Asia-Pacific Journal of Atmospheric Sciences(SCIE Journal) (‘11~‘15)
  • Associate Editor, Monthly Weather Review(SCI Journal) (‘11~‘15)
  • Visiting Scholar, Scripps Institute of Oceanography, UC San Diego, USA (‘07~‘12)
  • Associate and Full Professor of Atmospheric Sciences, Yonsei University (‘00~‘17)
  • Research Scientist, National Center for Environmental Prediction(NCEP), USA (‘93~‘00)
  • Research Associate, Seoul National University (‘92~‘93)

item.title: Joon Kim
item.description:
Education

    1. Ph.D., Biometeorology, University of Nebraska-Lincoln, NE, USA
    1. MS, Agricultural Meteorology, University of Nebraska-Lincoln, NE, USA
    1. BS, Atmospheric Sciences, Yonsei University, Seoul, Korea

Scientific Work Experience

    1. 4 ~ present Chair of AsiaFlux
    1. 1 ~ present Editor-in-Chief, Korean Journal of Agricultural and Forest Meteorology
    1. 3 ~ present Chair, Interdisciplinary Program in Agricultural and Forest Meteorology, Seoul National University
